meanings.definition: An error in printing or writing that results in a mistake or deviation from the intended text.
meanings.sent1: The misprint in the newspaper confused many readers.
meanings.sent2: I found a misprint in the book where a word was misspelled.
meanings.sent3: The misprint on the sign made it seem like the store was selling 'free' instead of 'coffee'.
meanings.sent4: Her misprint of the address led us to the wrong house.
meanings.sent5: The misprint on the menu made the price of the dessert seem unbelievably low.

meanings.definition: To print or write with errors or mistakes.
meanings.sent1: Please be careful not to misprint the important document.
meanings.sent2: The rushed writer misprinted several words in the article.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally misprinted his phone number on the business card.
meanings.sent4: The old printer often misprints pages with smudges and lines.
meanings.sent5: She tends to misprint numbers when she's in a hurry.
